title: Feature: Navigate to the "Cheer at the Ballpark" screen
custom_preconds:
Given: User has navigated to mlb.com/cheer 
And is on the landing screen, labeled 
"Cheer at the Ballpark"
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the top section of the 
screen
custom_expected:
Then the user sees the "Cheer at the Ballpark" 
header
And sees today's date
And "Select your team..." text
And 4 tiles showing matchups on today's
schedule display in the top section
And the teams are identified by club logos
And each of the tiles indicate the start time
of the matchup
And some display a "Live" tag

title: Feature: Navigate to the "Cheer at the Ballpark" screen
custom_preconds:
Given: User is on the landing screen, labeled 
"Cheer at the Ballpark"
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the lower section of 
the screen
custom_expected:
Then the user sees "These games do notÊcurrentlyÊ
feature remote fan participation." section header
And sees a number of tiles showing the team 
matchups identified with club logos
And each tile displays a time element: 
Live, <start time>, PPD. or Final
And, if the game has concluded, then the tile 
displays the final score

title:
Feature: Live state displays "Join The Crowd"
button
custom_preconds:
Given: User is viewing the tiles in the top 
section of the screen
custom_steps: When a tile state is in a "Live" state
custom_expected:
Then a game is Live, the button at the 
bottom of the tile will display, "Join The Crowd"

title:
Feature: Game Later in the Day state 
displays "Start Cheering in <30 Minutes>"
custom_preconds:
Given: User is viewing the tiles in the top 
section of the screen
custom_steps: When a tile state is 'later in the day'
custom_expected:
Then when a game starts later in the day, the button
at the bottom of the tile
will display "Start Cheering in <30 Minutes>

title: Feature: Game about to start state displays Join the Crowd
custom_preconds: Given: User is viewing the tiles in the top section of the screen
custom_steps: When a tile state is "Game about to start"
custom_expected: Then when a game is about to start, the button at the bottom of the tile will display, "Join The Crowd"

title: Feature: Choose a Game
custom_preconds: Given: User is viewing the tiles in the top section of the screen
custom_steps: When the user taps a tile in a "Live" state, on the upper section of the screen
custom_expected:
Then the screen shows an expanded view of the tile (matchup) selected
And the screen shows 2 buttons (each with club logo) that, when clicked, selects the team user is cheering for
And the CTA is "Join The Crowd"

title: Feature: Select a Team to Cheer for
custom_preconds: Given: User is viewing the two team buttons in the matchup
custom_steps: When the user taps one of the two team buttons
custom_expected: Then the user is redirected to a new screen (termed 'Remote') that displays the selected team's logo as wallpaper

title: Feature: Reselect the team to Cheer for
custom_preconds: Given: User is viewing the two team buttons in the matchup
custom_steps:
When the user taps one of the button with the two team matchup
And taps outside the selected tile
custom_expected: Then the buttons reset and the user is able to click the button for the other team

title: Feature: 'Remote' screen; Team ID's
custom_preconds:
Given: a game has started
And a viewer/user has selected a team
And the viewer/user is on the "Remote" screen
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the screen
custom_expected:
Then the user sees the "Cheer at the Ballpark" header
And under the header sees the names (team names not their cities) <A's @ Marlins, not <Oakland @ Miami>
And the team after the @ symbol indicates the home team

title: Feature: 'Remote' screen; Start times
custom_preconds:
Given: before a game has started
And a viewer/user has selected a team
And the viewer/user is on the "Remote" screen
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the screen
custom_expected: Then the time the game starts displays: <The game begins at 7:00 PM ET>

title: Feature: Attendance Bar
custom_preconds:
Given: before a game has started
And a viewer/user has selected a team
And the viewer/user is on the "Remote" screen
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the screen
custom_expected: Then user sees a bottom bar (termed Attendance bar) that is dynamic and represents the number of fans who have selected each team

title: Feature: Attendance bar is dynamic
custom_preconds:
Given: a game has started
And a viewer/user has selected a team
And the viewer/user is on the "Remote" screen
custom_steps: When the user returns to the 'Attendance' bar at various times throughout the game
custom_expected:
Then the page opens and the 'Attendance' bar flies in from either side of the screen
And the user will see the bar readjust based on the number of "Boo," "Cheer" & "Clap" taps that are made 
And these readjustments occur every minute

title: Feature: "Boo," "Cheer" & "Clap" buttons
custom_preconds:
Given: a game has started
And a viewer/user has selected a team
And the viewer/user is on the "Remote" screen
custom_steps: When the user views the bottom of the screen
custom_expected:
Then the buttons at the bottom of the screen ("Boo,", "Cheer" & Clap) are present and the colors of these buttons correspond to the selected team colors
And the "Boo," "Cheer" & "Clap" buttons are disabled prior to the start of the game

title: Feature: 'Remote' screen after the beginning of the game
custom_preconds:
Given: a game has started
And a viewer/user has selected a team
And the viewer/user is on the "Remote" screen
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the screen
custom_expected:
Then the time the game starts no longer displays
And the wallpaper now shows "Boo," "Cheer" & "Clap" icons 
And the volume of icons that display are dynamic, based on the number of fans who have selected either team
And the icons motion is up at all times
And the "Boo," "Cheer" & "Clap" buttons are enabled, now that the game has started

title: Feature: Users tap the "Boo," "Cheer" & "Clap" buttons, their individual and specific choices display above the buttons
custom_preconds:
Given: a game has started
And a viewer/user has selected a team
And the viewer/user is on the "Remote" screen
custom_steps:
When the user taps any of the "Boo," "Cheer" or 
"Clap" buttons
custom_expected:
Then the user sees an icon of the button the user 
just tapped just above the corresponding button

title: There will be a "Vote now for a chant!" section
custom_preconds: Given I am on the cheer fan page on a mobile device
custom_expected: Then I should see an option to vote for a chant

title: A user will see multiple options to select from for the "Chanting" option
custom_preconds: Given I am on the cheer fan page on a mobile device
custom_steps: And I click on the "Vote now for a chant"
custom_expected: Then I should see 2 options to pick a chant from

title: Tapping on a chant will show a check mark
custom_preconds: Given I am on the cheer fan page on a mobile device
custom_steps: And I click on the "Vote now for a chant" When I tap on a chant
custom_expected: Then I should see a check mark on the chant I selected

title: A user will see the voting percentage for a chant
custom_preconds: Given I am on the cheer fan page on a mobile device
custom_steps: When I select a chant And I wait for my selection to be processed on the UI
custom_expected: Then I should see the voiting percentage for each of the chant option

title: The most voted chant will be playing on the app
custom_preconds: Given I am on the cheer fan page on a mobile device
custom_steps:
When I select a chant 
And I wait for my selection to be processed on the UI
custom_expected:
Then I should see the voting percentage for each of the chant option 
And I should see the chant playing on the app

title: The voting url will contain "vote=true" parameter in the URL
For voting answers, if answer text is too long to fit, we will use ellipsis to hide the whole text
There will be a timer in chant header
The chant header/drawer will be expandable and collapsable with an arrow on the far right of the header
A user will not be able to vote for a chant when the timer turns 0:0
